title: Bloomberg Markets: Dan Fuss on Raising Interest Rates (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dan Fuss on Raising Interest Rates (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Dan Fuss Vice Chairman Loomis Sayles & Co. Renowned bond fund manager Dan Fuss -- Vice Chairman of Loomis Sayles & Co., where he manages their flagship Loomis Sayles Bond Fund -- discuss bond market outlook ahead of jobs report and look at how Trump's tax plan will impacts the bond market.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
